Posts.Content: Jan 24, 2010 06:46AM CDB wrote: Inspireme, Did you get the results of yur biopsy?  I just turned 50 in October but had yellow and bloody discharge off and on in both breasts starting when I was about 45.  I had two biopsies (core needle)in my right breast in the past three years and both were negative.  Hope yours is neg as well.  Cindy
